question:
Which among the following about All India Trade Union Congress (AITUC) are correct?
1. It was founded in 1920
2. Lala Lajpat Rai was the first president of AITUC
3. Diwan Chaman Lall was the first General Secretary of AITUC
4. It was the oldest trade union federations in India
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: All India Trade Union Congress (AITUC) was founded in 1920 (31 October). It was the oldest trade union federations in India. Lala Lajpat Rai was the first president and Diwan Chaman Lall was the first General Secretary of AITUC.
